scenario_text.value:
Hey, I see Kaito and Dracumon over there.
I wonder what those two are up to.
How do things look over there?

Some stuff washed up in the waterway,
but it’s all useless junk... Wait!
What is it, Dracumon?
Actually, this might be something we can use!
Woah, you’re right! Nice find!
It is pretty nice, if I say so myself! Hehe.

So, Kaito...
You and Dracumon are back on good terms now?
Say what?
(Oh, crap!)
(Now they might remember all the fighting!)

(What do I do?
I can’t let this spin out of control.)

(Should I apologize, or change the topic?
Or maybe hold my ground?)
(What should I say to keep the situation calm?)
I’d better apologize.
Change the subject!
Double down...
Sorry for being weird.

Everyone’s on edge, so I thought it’d be nice
if at least one pair made up.

You say “make up”, but I never meant
to be friendly in the first place.

I didn’t ask Dracumon to follow me around and
fight for me!
Don’t say that!

He’s right! This “bond” of ours just popped
up and tied us all on its own.
...Dracumon?

Thanks, Takuma, but I’m fine.
Don’t worry about me.

Alright, Kaito,
let’s get back to treasure-hunting!
You better find something good.

They’re not doing so well...
Maybe I said too much.
So, what was it you found earlier?
Oh come on, don’t try to change the subject.
Sorry...

Whatever, it’s not like I wanted to keep that
conversation going. I’ll play along.
This is what we found.

A...coin?
Must be foreign. I’ve never seen the design.

Might be ancient.
Maybe we can sell it in our world.

I’m gonna make it back somehow or other.
And bring Miu with me.

I’ll use anything I can to make that happen.
Who knows what’ll come in handy, even this!

Sounds like a plan.
We’ll survive this somehow.

(Dracumon is talking like normal,
but he seems somehow dejected.)

(I can’t undo what I said...
So I’ll stay the course!)

It looks like you’re back on good terms,
like the old days.

Not gonna back down, huh?
I wouldn’t put it like that, though.
Yeah, there’s just a tight bond between us...
That’s not what I meant, either.

I don’t care about “trust” or “bonds.”
Just getting back to our world with Miu.

If this THING ever turned against me and
put Miu in danger...

I would not hold back,
lemme put it that way.

Look at Kaito’s face, Takuma.
It’s scary...

(It really is.
Just like the time he blew up at Dracumon.)
Look, I get that you’re worried about us.

I’ll try to be nice while we’re still allies—
for now.

Alright, back to exploring.
You coming, Dracumon?
...Right.

There they go.
I hope those two are okay.
I don’t know...
Takuma, what do you think those two—
Maybe I should just leave him alone for now.
